name: Gibbering Mouther
description: A horrifying mass of flesh covered in multiple eyes and mouths that constantly babble in incomprehensible voices, slithering and oozing across the ground.
memorable: Its endless gibbering can drive creatures mad, causing confusion and fear, while it absorbs victims into its body.
goals: To consume any living thing it encounters.
relations: Might be found in areas with other aberrations or chaotic entities.
environment: Usually found in bizarre and chaotic places, often swamps or areas of aberrant energy.
strengths: High hit points and resistance to psychic damage; can cause confusion and manipulate terrain.
weaknesses: Low armor class and poor Dexterity make it vulnerable to physical attacks.
attacks: Makes bite attacks that deal piercing damage and can absorb killed creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Gibbering ability can confuse foes, disrupting their actions and control.
senses: It has darkvision up to 60 feet.
skills: Average perception makes it capable of noticing hidden creatures.
additional_information: Amphibious, can breathe in air and water.
Ground becomes difficult terrain within 10-foot radius.
Can spit blinding bile to hinder foes.
Resistance to mental incapacitations such as charm and fear.
Ability to absorb dead melee victims into its mass.
